name: Rocket of Souls
description:
A giant asteroid is approaching Earth. Humanity is doomed. But people built a giant rocket to leave the planet and find a new home. The rocket engine is powered by the energy of the souls, it is fully charged. Will there be enough fuel to get to the new Earth? Will everyone get to the new house or have to sacrifice someone?

How to play:

  • Watch for soul-fuel in the tank.
  • Aim with mouse to the target.
  • Shoot the cannon asteroids.
  • Repair ship damage.
  • Click for throw away a capsule with humans if you want to add soul-fuel to the tank.
  • Click for throw away a cargo container if you want to decrease a fuel consumption.

WARNING: Every shot spends soul-fuel. Think carefully before using the cannon frequently.
